MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon affecting properties in Trem Eilian and the surrounding area. Our engineers are on site and currently waiting for additional resources to assist with repairs on the overhead line network. We now expect to have your power restored by 4:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 13:10pm on the 3rd December 2020.
